title: Russian mercenary videos 'top 1bn views' on TikTok
description: The platform is said to be hosting hundreds of videos that celebrate the Russian Wagner group.

title: Elon Musk's Starlink to help strengthen internet in remote UK places
description: World’s richest man’s company is involved in a trial to get isolated areas of the UK connected to the internet.

title: Foxconn: iPhone maker offers payments for finding new workers
description: Apple has warned shipments of the iPhone 14 would be delayed due to Covid-19 restrictions.
